== Economy ==
The local economy is primarily based on agriculture. Budhana lies in the Upper Doab region
column2: a fertile area close to the Upper Ganges Canal. The main crops are wheat
column3: sugarcane and mustard. People from the surrounding villages come to Budhana for their buying and selling needs.
